messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Flylady!
messages.msgSnippet: Heidi, I m sorry but Flylady nearly KILLED ME!  LOL  Alllllllllll those emails ordering me to shine my sink!! and dress to the shoes or whatever.  What if I
messages.messageBody:
Heidi, I'm sorry but Flylady nearly KILLED ME! LOL Alllllllllll those emails ordering me to "shine my sink!!" and dress to the shoes or whatever. What if I don't WANNA wear shoes all the time??

And one load of laundry a day?!?!? You're kiddin right? Lightweight! ; )

Signed,
The Tide Mom (minimum 2 loads per day - every day - till I die it seems!)
----- Original Message -----
From: Heidi
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, April 30, 2003 3:35 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: moms doing what they want/flylady


Flylady saved my house. Seriously. A mountain was swallowing it up,
sucking it down into the bowels of the earth.

Laundry. Her hint of doing one load of laundry every day SAVED my
house.

Look up flylady. Good stuff.

HEidiC


> I realize this is long, but I just wanted to give you a taste of my
short
> morning. I've had plenty of time to pursue my interests but I do
it in
> spurts. I also clean and do just about everything else in spurts.
If I
> didn't plan ahead it would take me 2 hours to get the kids dressed
and ready
> to go. Instead,I spend about 15 minutes after they head to bed to
find
> everything we will need for the next day. I HIGHLY recommend
FlyLady to
> help you get organized. It's for your home, but somehow it clears
up your
> head, too!



Yahoo! Groups Sponsor

messages.subject: Re: Flylady!
messages.msgSnippet: ... those emails ordering me to shine my sink!! and dress to the shoes or whatever.  What if I don t WANNA wear shoes all the time?? ... Lightweight!  ; )
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com, "Melinda"
<melindav98@t...> wrote:
> Heidi, I'm sorry but Flylady nearly KILLED ME! LOL Alllllllllll
those emails ordering me to "shine my sink!!" and dress to the shoes
or whatever. What if I don't WANNA wear shoes all the time??
>
> And one load of laundry a day?!?!? You're kiddin right?
Lightweight! ; )
>
> Signed,
> The Tide Mom (minimum 2 loads per day - every day - till I die it
seems!)

LOL when I first found flylady, I did everything to the last letter,
every time it came up on my email! LOL Now I've mellowed out. I still
shine my sink...about five times per week. And the laundry thing. One
a day does it, but on Saturdays I get caught up all the way, doing
four or five loads, and take the day off on Sundays, most weeks.
There's a comfortable level of clutter in the place, that easily
comes together to Having Someone Over If They Don't Peer Too Closely
in a half hour, and really deep, Company Party Feast Clean, in about
three hours. I'm happy with it. I did go nuts at first, though, I
must admit! LOL

Besides the laundry and shiny sink, the idea of doing things for 15
minutes and then taking a break. That's a good idea. Spurts.

HeidiC
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Heidi
> To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Flylady!
messages.msgSnippet: I never even signed up for the Flymail.  TOO much!  Finally, I went out and bought her book.  I love it.  No emails, and no trying to find the right page on
messages.messageBody:
I never even signed up for the Flymail. TOO much! Finally, I went out and
bought her book. I love it. No emails, and no trying to find the right
page on her website. I can take what I like and leave the rest. She really
does have some great ideas, though!

Jennifer, who never did get that shoe thing. I never wear shoes unless I'm
going to get kicked out of a place! <bg>
